Load and preprocess the data
```{r load and preprocess}
    library("reshape2")
    df<-read.csv("activity.csv",header=TRUE)
    data<-na.omit(df)
    data$steps <- as.numeric(data$steps)
    melted <- melt(data,id=c(2:3),measure=c(1),na.rm=TRUE)
    sumsteps <- dcast(melted, date~variable,sum)
    
    
```
Mean number of total daily steps:
```{r mean steps,echo=FALSE}
    meansteps <- mean(sumsteps$steps)
    print(meansteps)
```

Median number of total daily steps:
```{r median steps,echo=FALSE}
    mediansteps <- median(sumsteps$steps)
    print(mediansteps)
```

Histogram
```{r histogram,echo=FALSE}
    hist(sumsteps$steps,xlab="Total Number of Daily Steps")

```
